typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PurchaseOrderID as string,
		CustomerCode as string,
		ProductCode as string,
		EmployeCode as string,
		PurchaseOrderDate as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> PurchaseOrderSorce
source(output(
		CustomerCode as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		Address as string,
		PhoneNumber as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CustomerSource
PurchaseOrderSorce select(mapColumn(
		CustomerCode,
		ProductCode,
		Quantity
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PurchaseOrderProject
CustomerSource select(mapColumn(
		CustomerCode,
		CustomerName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerProject
PurchaseOrderProject, CustomerProject join(PurchaseOrderProject@CustomerCode == CustomerProject@CustomerCode,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinStream
JoinStream aggregate(groupBy(PurchaseOrderProject@CustomerCode),
	count = sum(Quantity)) ~> MerticsStream
MerticsStream sink(input(
		CustomerCode as string,
		Count as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Count = count,
		CustomerCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
